Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.eclipse.linuxtools.tmf.core.timestamp.TmfTimestampFormat.setDefaultIntervalFormat(String)
    The default interval format pattern depends on the preferences, see TmfTimePreferences. To change the default time pattern, modify the preferences and call updateDefaultFormats()
    org.eclipse.linuxtools.tmf.core.timestamp.TmfTimestampFormat.setDefaultTimeFormat(String)
    The default time pattern depends on the preferences, see TmfTimePreferences. To change the default time pattern, modify the preferences and call updateDefaultFormats()
